subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: While the behavior of certain A.C. Milan on Tuesday was disgraceful, Raúl González’s performance for Schalke was a reminder of the pure and sweet purpose of soccer.
snippet: While the behavior of certain A.C. Milan on Tuesday was disgraceful, Raúl González’s performance for Schalke was a reminder of the pure and sweet purpose of soccer.
